item.title: Pythonic Principles: Best Practices for Clean Code
item.description:
Description

Python's simplicity and readability make it a popular choice for developers. However, being Pythonic goes beyond writing functional code; it's about crafting elegant, maintainable, and collaborative code. This talk is designed for Python enthusiasts of all levels.

We'll explore the significance of Pythonic programming and its impact on code readability. Outcomes: By the end of this talk, participants will: 1. Understand the significance of Pythonic programming and its benefits. 2. Become familiar with style guidelines and best practices. 3. Learn techniques to write clean, readable, and Pythonic code. 4. Cultivate a Pythonic mindset for code development and maintenance.
item.dc:creator: Swarooprani Manoor
